item.description:
Let's walk the North End, Waterfront, Beacon Hill and Stop for Amazing coffee!

I brought one of my good friends who was up from NYC to Caffe Vittoria. She loves coffee as much as I do and we both loved the coffee here!! We both took as sip and looked at each other and said "this coffee is FN great coffee!" They must put crack into it or something :)

The pressed-tin ceilings and marble-topped tables for the style-conscious North Enders, who stop in for pick-me-ups. There's also a good dessert menu, featuring the city's best gelati and staples ranging from cannoli to tiramisu.

How about taking a walk around the North End, Govt Ctr, Beacon Hill areas and grabbing a cup or two of incredible coffee?

If you're in let me know. Thanks!

PS - Bring your camera. It's a good way to get some great shots of the city's different neighborhoods.

group.name: Brunch & More (20/30-Somethings for brunch & more, etc...)

item.name: Best Coffee in City - Walk the North End, Waterfront, Beacon Hill & Great Coffee
